summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2158 for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue and Twenty-sixth Avenue North, from East Union Street to East Thomas Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in The City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks and concrete stairways; under Ordinance No.21617, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
